name: Kidlat Jump
description:
NO in-app purchase!!!

Be warned: this game is insanely addictive and viral.

******************************************************************************

In Kidlat Jump game, you help Kidlat (our chihuahua) using swipe left or swipe right on screen to jump to the left or right respectively—on a challenging and fun journey up, up, up above the skies, picking up coins along the way, avoiding different bones, and the thorny suns.

Jump, jump, jump as high as you can.

LOL with delight as Kidlat helps you past other players' best score in the Game Center.

Other features:
- share your score and screen on facebook, twitter or yahoo.
- nice background music

How to navigate Kidlat:
- press and hold down the screen then swipe left or right to jump left or right.


******************************************************************************
